name: Wall of Fire
cast-trigger: when you are targeted with an attack
dur-trigger: when the creature targets someone else with an attack

components.material: a long enough string of text that it will wrap onto the next line in a text editor worth 2cp, which is consumed with the casting of this spell

description: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter. The wall is 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration.
desc-higher: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th.
